00034 #undef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN

00037 // vint limits
00038 #define HT_MAX_V1B 0x7f
00039 #define HT_MAX_V2B 0x3fff
00040 #define HT_MAX_V3B 0x1fffff
00041 #define HT_MAX_V4B 0xfffffff
00042 #define HT_MAX_V5B 0x7ffffffffull
00043 #define HT_MAX_V6B 0x3ffffffffffull
00044 #define HT_MAX_V7B 0x1ffffffffffffull
00045 #define HT_MAX_V8B 0xffffffffffffffull
00046 #define HT_MAX_V9B 0x7fffffffffffffffull
00047 
00048 #define HT_MAX_LEN_VINT32 5
00049 #define HT_MAX_LEN_VINT64 10
00050 
00051 // vint encode
00052 #define HT_ENCODE_VINT0(_op_, _val_) \
00053   if (_val_ <= HT_MAX_V1B) { \
00054     *(_op_)++ = (uint8_t)((_val_) & 0x7f); \
00055     return; \
00056   }
00057 
00058 #define HT_ENCODE_VINT_(_op_, _val_) \
00059   *(_op_)++ = (uint8_t)((_val_) | 0x80); \
00060   _val_ >>= 7; \
00061   HT_ENCODE_VINT0(_op_, _val_)
00062 
00063 #define HT_ENCODE_VINT4(_op_, _val_) \
00064   HT_ENCODE_VINT_(_op_, _val_) HT_ENCODE_VINT_(_op_, _val_) \
00065   HT_ENCODE_VINT_(_op_, _val_) HT_ENCODE_VINT_(_op_, _val_)
00066 
00067 // vint decode
00068 #define HT_DECODE_NEED(_rp_, _n_) \
00069   if (*(_rp_) < _n_) \
00070     throw Exception(Error::SERIALIZATION_INPUT_OVERRUN); \
00071   *(_rp_) -= _n_
00072 
00073 #define HT_DECODE_VINT0(_type_, _n_, _ip_, _rp_) \
00074   HT_DECODE_NEED(_rp_, 1); \
00075   _type_ _n_ = (*(_ip_)++ & 0x7f), shift = 0;
00076 
00077 #define HT_DECODE_VINT_(_type_, _n_, _ip_, _rp_) \
00078   shift += 7; \
00079   if ((_ip_)[-1] & 0x80) { \
00080     HT_DECODE_NEED(_rp_, 1); \
00081     _n_ |= ((_type_)(*(_ip_)++ & 0x7f) << shift); \
00082   } else return _n_;
00083 
00084 #define HT_DECODE_VINT4(_type_, _n_, _ip_, _rp_) \
00085   HT_DECODE_VINT_(_type_, _n_, _ip_, _rp_) \
00086   HT_DECODE_VINT_(_type_, _n_, _ip_, _rp_) \
00087   HT_DECODE_VINT_(_type_, _n_, _ip_, _rp_) \
00088   HT_DECODE_VINT_(_type_, _n_, _ip_, _rp_)
00089

00099     inline void encode_bool(uint8_t **bufp, bool bval) {
00100       *(*bufp) = (bval) ? 1 : 0;
00101       (*bufp)++;
00102     }
00103 
00104 
00114     inline bool decode_bool(uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainingp, bool *boolp) {
00115       if (*remainingp == 0)
00116         return false;
00117       *boolp = (*(*bufp) == 0) ? false : true;
00118       (*bufp)++;
00119       (*remainingp)--;
00120       return true;
00121     }

00133     inline bool decode_byte(uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainingp, uint8_t *bytePtr) {
00134       if (*remainingp == 0)
00135         return false;
00136       *bytePtr = *(*bufp)++;
00137       (*remainingp)--;
00138       return true;
00139     }

00149     inline void encode_short(uint8_t **bufp, uint16_t sval) {
00150 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00151       memcpy(*bufp, &sval, 2);
00152       *bufp += 2;
00153 #else
00154       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)sval;
00155       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(sval >> 8);
00156 #endif
00157     }
00158 
00159 
00169     inline bool decode_short(uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainingp, uint16_t *svalp) {
00170       if (*remainingp < 2)
00171         return false;
00172 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00173       memcpy(svalp, *bufp, 2);
00174       *bufp += 2;
00175 #else
00176       *svalp = *(*bufp)++;
00177       *svalp |= (*(*bufp)++ << 8);
00178 #endif
00179       *remainingp -= 2;
00180       return true;
00181     }

00191     inline void encode_int(uint8_t **bufp, uint32_t ival) {
00192 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00193       memcpy(*bufp, &ival, 4);
00194       *bufp += 4;
00195 #else
00196       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)ival;
00197       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(ival >> 8);
00198       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(ival >> 16);
00199       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(ival >> 24);
00200 #endif
00201     }

00213     inline bool decode_int(uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainingp, uint32_t *ivalp) {
00214       if (*remainingp < 4)
00215         return false;
00216 
00217 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00218       memcpy(ivalp, *bufp, 4);
00219       *bufp += 4;
00220 #else
00221       *ivalp = *(*bufp)++;
00222       *ivalp |= (*(*bufp)++ << 8);
00223       *ivalp |= (*(*bufp)++ << 16);
00224       *ivalp |= (*(*bufp)++ << 24);
00225 #endif
00226       *remainingp -= 4;
00227       return true;
00228     }

00238     inline void encode_long(uint8_t **bufp, uint64_t lval) {
00239 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00240       memcpy(*bufp, &lval, 8);
00241       *bufp += 8;
00242 #else
00243       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)lval;
00244       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(lval >> 8);
00245       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(lval >> 16);
00246       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(lval >> 24);
00247       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(lval >> 32);
00248       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(lval >> 40);
00249       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(lval >> 48);
00250       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(lval >> 56);
00251 #endif
00252     }

00264     inline bool decode_long(uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainingp, uint64_t *lvalp) {
00265       if (*remainingp < 8)
00266         return false;
00267 
00268 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00269       memcpy(lvalp, *bufp, 8);
00270       *bufp += 8;
00271 #else
00272       *lvalp = *(*bufp)++;
00273       *lvalp |= (*(*bufp)++ << 8);
00274       *lvalp |= (*(*bufp)++ << 16);
00275       *lvalp |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 24);
00276       *lvalp |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 32);
00277       *lvalp |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 40);
00278       *lvalp |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 48);
00279       *lvalp |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 56);
00280 #endif
00281 
00282       *remainingp -= 8;
00283       return true;
00284     }

00292     inline size_t encoded_length_byte_array(int32_t len) {
00293       return len + 4;
00294     }

00306     inline void encode_byte_array(uint8_t **bufp, const void *data, int32_t len) {
00307       encode_int(bufp, len);
00308       memcpy(*bufp, (uint8_t *)data, len);
00309       *bufp += len;
00310     }

00312 
00324     inline bool decode_byte_array(uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainingp, uint8_t **dstPtr, int32_t *lenp) {
00325       // length
00326       if (*remainingp < 4)
00327         return false;
00328       if (!decode_int(bufp, remainingp, (uint32_t *)lenp))
00329         return false;
00330       // data
00331       if (*remainingp < (size_t)*lenp)
00332         return false;
00333       *dstPtr = (*bufp);
00334       *remainingp -= *lenp;
00335       *bufp += *lenp;
00336       return true;
00337     }

00345     inline size_t encoded_length_string(const char *str) {
00346       return 2 + ((str == 0) ? 0 : strlen(str)) + 1;
00347     }
00348 
00349 
00356     inline size_t encoded_length_string(const std::string &str) {
00357       return encoded_length_string(str.c_str());
00358     }

00360 
00371     inline void encode_string(uint8_t **bufp, const char *str) {
00372       uint16_t len = (str == 0) ? 0 : strlen(str);
00373 
00374       encode_short(bufp, len);
00375 
00376       // string characters
00377       if (len > 0) {
00378         memcpy(*bufp, str, len);
00379         (*bufp) += len;
00380       }
00381 
00382       // '\\0' terminator
00383       *(*bufp)++ = 0;
00384     }
00385 
00386 
00397     inline void encode_string(uint8_t **bufp, const std::string &str) {
00398       encode_string(bufp, str.c_str());
00399     }

00401 
00414     inline bool decode_string(uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainingp, const char **strp) {
00415       uint16_t len;
00416       *strp = 0;
00417       if (*remainingp < 3)
00418         return false;
00419       if (!decode_short(bufp, remainingp, &len))
00420         return false;
00421       if (*remainingp < (size_t)len+1)
00422         return false;
00423       *strp = (const char *)*bufp;
00424       *remainingp -= (size_t)len+1;
00425       *bufp += (size_t)len+1;
00426       return true;
00427     }
00428 
00429 
00441     inline bool decode_string(uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainingp, std::string &str) {
00442       const char *cstr;
00443       if (!decode_string(bufp, remainingp, &cstr))
00444         return false;
00445       str = cstr;
00446       return true;
00447     }

00456     inline uint8_t decode_i8(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00457       if (*remainp < 1)
00458         throw Exception(Error::SERIALIZATION_INPUT_OVERRUN);
00459 
00460       *remainp -= 1;
00461       return *(*bufp)++;
00462     }

00471     inline void encode_i16(uint8_t **bufp , uint16_t val) {
00472 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00473       memcpy(*bufp, &val, 2);
00474       *bufp += 2;
00475 #else
00476       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)val;
00477       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 8);
00478 #endif
00479     }

00489     inline uint16_t decode_i16(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00490       if (*remainp < 2)
00491         throw Exception(Error::SERIALIZATION_INPUT_OVERRUN);
00492 
00493 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00494       uint16_t val;
00495       memcpy(&val, *bufp, 2);
00496       *bufp += 2;
00497 #else
00498       uint16_t val = *(*bufp)++;
00499       val |= (*(*bufp)++ << 8);
00500 #endif
00501       *remainp -= 2;
00502 
00503       return val;
00504     }

00513     inline void encode_i32(uint8_t **bufp, uint32_t val) {
00514 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00515       memcpy(*bufp, &val, 4);
00516       *bufp += 4;
00517 #else
00518       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)val;
00519       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 8);
00520       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 16);
00521       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 24);
00522 #endif
00523     }

00562       *bufp += 8;

00583     inline uint64_t decode_i64(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00584       if (*remainp < 8)
00585         throw Exception(Error::SERIALIZATION_INPUT_OVERRUN);
00586 
00587 #ifdef BOOST_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00588       uint64_t val;
00589       memcpy(&val, *bufp, 8);
00590       *bufp += 8;
00591 #else
00592       uint64_t val = *(*bufp)++;
00593       val |= (*(*bufp)++ << 8);
00594       val |= (*(*bufp)++ << 16);
00595       val |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 24);
00596       val |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 32);
00597       val |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 40);
00598       val |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 48);
00599       val |= ((uint64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 56);
00600 #endif
00601       *remainp -= 8;
00602 
00603       return val;
00604     }

00613     inline int encoded_length_vi32(uint32_t val) {
00614       return (val <= HT_MAX_V1B ? 1 : \
00615               (val <= HT_MAX_V2B ? 2 : \
00616                (val <= HT_MAX_V3B ? 3 : \
00617                 (val <= HT_MAX_V4B ? 4 : 5))));
00618     }
00619 
00626     inline int encoded_length_vi64(uint64_t val) {
00627       return (val <= HT_MAX_V1B ? 1 : \
00628               (val <= HT_MAX_V2B ? 2 : \
00629                (val <= HT_MAX_V3B ? 3 : \
00630                 (val <= HT_MAX_V4B ? 4 : \
00631                  (val <= HT_MAX_V5B ? 5 : \
00632                   (val <= HT_MAX_V6B ? 6 : \
00633                    (val <= HT_MAX_V7B ? 7 : \
00634                     (val <= HT_MAX_V8B ? 8 : \
00635                      (val <= HT_MAX_V9B ? 9 : 10)))))))));
00636     }

00644     inline void encode_vi32(uint8_t **bufp, uint32_t val) {
00645       HT_ENCODE_VINT0(*bufp, val)
00646       HT_ENCODE_VINT4(*bufp, val)
00647       HT_ENCODE_VINT_(*bufp, val)
00648       HT_EXPECT(!"corrupted vint32", Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00649     }
00650 
00657     inline void encode_vi64(uint8_t **bufp, uint64_t val) {
00658       HT_ENCODE_VINT0(*bufp, val)
00659       HT_ENCODE_VINT4(*bufp, val)
00660       HT_ENCODE_VINT4(*bufp, val)
00661       HT_ENCODE_VINT_(*bufp, val)
00662       HT_EXPECT(!"corrupted vint64", Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00663     }

00672     inline uint32_t decode_vi32(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00673       HT_DECODE_VINT0(uint32_t, n, *bufp, remainp)
00674       HT_DECODE_VINT4(uint32_t, n, *bufp, remainp)
00675       HT_DECODE_VINT_(uint32_t, n, *bufp, remainp)
00676       throw Exception(Error::SERIALIZATION_BAD_VINT);
00677     }
00678 
00686     inline uint64_t decode_vi64(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00687       HT_DECODE_VINT0(uint64_t, n, *bufp, remainp)
00688       HT_DECODE_VINT4(uint64_t, n, *bufp, remainp)
00689       HT_DECODE_VINT4(uint64_t, n, *bufp, remainp)
00690       HT_DECODE_VINT_(uint64_t, n, *bufp, remainp)
00691       HT_DECODE_VINT_(uint64_t, n, *bufp, remainp)
00692       throw Exception(Error::SERIALIZATION_BAD_VINT);
00693     }

00701     inline uint32_t decode_vi32(const uint8_t **bufp) {
00702       size_t remain = 6;
00703       return decode_vi32(bufp, &remain);
00704     }

00713       size_t remain = 12;

00725     inline size_t encoded_length_cstr(const char *s) {
00726       uint32_t len = s ? strlen(s) : 0;
00727       return 1 + len + encoded_length_vi32(len);
00728     }

00737     inline void encode_cstr(uint8_t **bufp, const char *s) {
00738       uint32_t len = s ? strlen(s) : 0;
00739 
00740       encode_vi32(bufp, len);
00741 
00742       if (len) {
00743         memcpy(*bufp, s, len);
00744         *bufp += len;
00745       }
00746       *(*bufp)++ = 0;
00747     }
00748 
00749 
00757     inline const char *decode_cstr(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00758       uint32_t len = decode_vi32(bufp, remainp) + 1;
00759       const char *buf = (const char *)*bufp;
00760 
00761       if (*remainp < len)
00762         throw Exception(Error::SERIALIZATION_INPUT_OVERRUN);
00763 
00764       *bufp += len;
00765       *remainp -= len;
00766 
00767       if ((*bufp)[-1]) // should be null
00768         throw Exception(Error::SERIALIZATION_BAD_CSTR);
00769 
00770       return buf;
00771     }
